name: Zen Roller
description:
Zen Roller is an elegant casual game where the player must roll their ball through mazes of increasing size and through areas of increasing difficulty.

* Zen Roller has simple and pleasing high quality graphics. It looks great on iPhones and iPads.

* Zen Roller has an awesome musical soundtrack. The playlist is shuffled each time you play so it doesn't get boring.

* Zen Roller generates all mazes uniquely. You will never see the same maze twice.

* Zen Roller starts quickly. When you launch the game you will be placed straight into the game world. This game is perfect for when you want to play quickly and don't want to waste time with ads, menus, profiles, prompts, social media and other nags.

* Zen Roller keeps rolling. The game world is continuously built while you play. You never have to stop to change levels - just roll to the next level.

* Zen Roller is not frustrating. Mistakes are not punished harshly. Young children can play this game, no problem.

* Zen Roller does not have any in-App Purchases, advertisements or social media integrations.

* Zen Roller is chill. Zen Roller is zen.
